text: Jaroszewice is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bełżyce, within Lublin County, Lublin Voivodeship, in eastern Poland. It lies approximately east of Bełżyce and west of the regional capital Lublin. The village has a population of 390. Roman Bartoszcze, the politician and art collector was born there. ==References== Category:Villages in Lublin County
title: Jaroszewice
